page.title: 04THE SHOPPING CENTRE:TILBURY
page.content: In Tilbury town shopping centre there are lots of shops, with everything you need.There are food shops, clothes shops, shoe shops, banks and building societies, a material shop, pet shop, take-away food shops, car spares, newsagents, a florist, D.I.Y shops, betting shops, chemists, gift shops, bakers, a carpet showroom and you can even buy a three piece suite! Most people in Tilbury use the{Civic {Shopping Centre}but if there is something they cannot get here they can get on the ferry and go to Gravesend or catch a bus or train to Grays.
